EmailTemplate.subject: Join Turbonomic for a private cruise on the San Diego harbor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}!
We'd like you to join us for an afternoon of drinks, appetizers and ocean breezes aboard the Quiet Heart on Wednesday, November 14th.
Come hear success stories and learnings from industry-leading IT executives at the forefront of the transformational hybrid cloud journey. You will walk away equipped with answers and principles to implement an effective hybrid cloud strategy.
RSVP: Hybrid Cloud Event - San Diego <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-san-diego/]]> Flagship Cruises 990 North Harbor Drive Wednesday, November 14 at 3:30 PM
Best, Turbonomic Team
